Astral Cycle.card_desc: [Astral Mark] Increase the duration of Astral Mark by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Binary Star.card_desc: [Weapon] Star Splitter now deals 360 damage every 0.4s.

Cosmic Barrier.card_desc: [Stellar Wind] Gain {scale=5|5}% damage reduction while using Stellar Wind.

Eclipse.card_desc: [Void Grip] Heal for {scale=50|50} Health per second while using Void Grip.

Falling Star.card_desc: [Void Grip] If a victim of Void Grip dies within 4s of being hit by the ability, reduce all active cooldowns by {scale=20|20}%

Heavenly Pull.card_desc: [Void Grip] Increase the Range you can use Void Grip by {scale=10|10}%

Inner Peace.card_desc: [Void Grip] Reduce the cooldown of Void Grip by {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Lightyears.card_desc: [Astral Mark] Increase Astral Mark's range by {scale=10|10}%

Luminary.card_desc: [Astral Mark] Any ally affected by your Astral Mark deals 15% more weapon damage.

Relativity.card_desc: [Astral Mark] Applying Astral Mark heals you for {scale=40|40} Health per second over 10 seconds.

Retrograde.card_desc: [Astral Mark] Reduce the Cooldown of Astral Mark by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Solar Sails.card_desc: [Stellar Wind] Gain {scale=2|2} ammo per second during Stellar Wind.

Space Jam.card_desc: [Stellar Wind] Increase your jump height by {scale=12|12}% while using Stellar Wind.

Star Seeker.card_desc: [Stellar Wind] Increase air control by {scale=14|14}% while using Stellar Wind.

The Power Cosmeum.card_desc: [Void Grip] Enemies affected by Void Grip are crippled and take an additional 360 damage over its duration.
